content.raw:
The `broker` object contains three member variables:

* incomingMsgs: We should probably clear this deque too.
* clients: List of clients already registered. I think we shouldn't touch this variable.
* endpoints: This contains all the clients bound to each endpoint. I feel we should clear it.

The changes are in b1b094c. Feel free to merge if sounds reasonable.
content.html:
The broker object contains three member variables:

  • incomingMsgs: We should probably clear this deque too.
  • clients: List of clients already registered. I think we shouldn't touch this variable.
  • endpoints: This contains all the clients bound to each endpoint. I feel we should clear it.

The changes are in b1b094c. Feel free to merge if sounds reasonable.
